meanings.definition: An instrument used to record and analyze the spectrum of light
meanings.sent1: Scientists use spectrographs to study different colors of light.
meanings.sent2: The observatory's advanced spectrographs helped identify the composition of the star.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat mistook the spectrographs for colorful toys.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like spectrographs, capturing every detail of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The spectrographs hummed softly as they revealed the secrets of the galaxy.
